item.title: About
item.description: About me I’m a software developer and I live in Borås, Sweden. I read all my emails and try to respond to them within a timely manner. I’m the author of An API Of Ice And Fire which has gotten a decent amount of press coverage over the years. I like dabbling with all sorts of technologies and love learning new stuff. I love all sorts of music and I’m passionate about football (soccer for you americans out there).

item.title: Projects
item.description: An API Of Ice And Fire Star An API Of Ice And Fire is the worlds greatest source for quantified and structured data from the universe of Ice And Fire. It has gotten a decent amount of press coverage, some of it is listed below. The Wall Street Journal (Paywall) IDG.se (Swedish) Borås Tidning (Swedish and paywall) Cashew Star Cashew is a simple and elegant yet powerful HTTP client cache for .
